summary: BACK UP CAMERA SCREEN IS TOO DARK, EVEN ON THE LIGHTEST CONTROL SETTING. I'VE BROUGHT THE VEHICLE TO TWO DEALERSHIPS AND OPENED A COMPLAINT WITH THE COMPANY'S CUSTOMER CARE. I'VE BEEN TOLD THE CAMERA IS OPERATING NORMAL OR AN ADDITIONAL CAMERA SHOULD BE INSTALLED AT MY EXPENSE (THIS CAMERA WOULD ONLY DISPLAY THE TRUCK BED) PLUS MY TRUCK IS NOT EQUIPPED FOR THIS FEATURE
